2+1.sig_info: The only known Synthezoid, the Vision is capable of synthesizing 8.89 to 50.02% Power periodically during battle. 01001111 01010000

SPECIAL ATTACKS: If this attack reduces the enemy to zero Power Meter, the opponent gains a Heal Block Debuff for 7 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Burns up to 39% of the target's max Power and inflicts Direct Damage proportionate to the amount lost.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Burns up to 100% of the target's max Power and inflicts Direct Damage proportionate to the amount lost.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Burns up to 33% of the target's max Power and inflicts Direct Damage proportionate to the amount lost.
PASSIVE: Advanced robotics provides full immunity to Poison and Bleed effects.
